page.title: 18An Elderly Couple's Day
page.content: My Grandma and Grandad get up at 7.30.My Grandma makes the tea and they drink it in bed.Grandma gets dressed and has a little something to eat.Grandad gets up about 12.0' clock.The grand children visit about 1.30 and stay for half an hour for a snack. Grandma walks down to the shop and shops for all the food she needs.In the evening she sorts out all her money and watches the television. Grandad sits in his chair smoking and drinking Guinness.He watches sport and news at 9.00o'clock.Then they both get ready for bed and they read a book until they get tired and they fall asleep.
